name: omnibot
description: AI agent with LLM rotation, function calling, and self-upgrade capabilities

scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:comprehensive: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:api && npm run test:security && npm run test:smoke && npm run test:e2e
scripts.log:worker:staging: cd cloudflare-worker && npx wrangler tail --env staging
scripts.log:worker:prod: cd cloudflare-worker && npx wrangler tail --env production
scripts.log:pages:staging: cd frontend && npx wrangler pages deployment tail --project-name omnibot-ui-staging
scripts.log:pages:prod: cd frontend && npx wrangler pages deployment tail --project-name omni-agent-ui
